GeneralMessages.DBCleared: You have <color=#FF3300>cleared</color> the Magic Homes database.
GeneralMessages.MaxHomes: You have reached your maximum allowed homes. ({max_homes})
GeneralMessages.NoAuthLevel: You <color=#FF3300>do not</color> have access to this command.
GeneralMessages.NoTeleports: There is currently <color=red>nowhere</color> to teleport to.
GeneralMessages.PlayerNoAwake: You <color=red>cannot</color> attack someone who has not woken up from teleporting.
GeneralMessages.SetupHome: You have setup a new home! (Use /t <home> at any time).
GeneralMessages.TeleportCreated:
Created teleport <color=#FF0000>{id}</color> at your current location!
Title: {title} : <color=yellow>Description:</color> {description},
<color=yellow>Sleep God:</color> {sleepgod} | <color=yellow>Auth Level:</color> {authlevel} | Enabled: <color=yellow>{enabled}</color>.
GeneralMessages.TPCooldown: You are not currently allowed to teleport. (<color=#FF0000>{cooldown} second cooldown</color>).
GeneralMessages.TPGeneral: You will be teleported to {title} in <color=#FFFF00>{seconds}</color> seconds (<color=#FFFF00>{tpcount}</color>).
GeneralMessages.TPHome: You will be teleported to your home in <color=#FFFF00>{seconds}</color> seconds (<color=#FFFF00>{title}</color>).

HomeMessages.Alive: You <color=#FF0000>can't</color> teleport home when you're not even <color=#FF0000>alive</color>.
HomeMessages.BuildingBlocked: You <color=#FF0000>can't</color> teleport home when you're in a <color=#FF0000>building blocked</color> area.
HomeMessages.Fire: You <color=#FF0000>can't</color> teleport home when you're on <color=#FF0000>fire</color>.
HomeMessages.MinHP: Your health <color=#FF0000>needs</color> to be above <color=#FF0000>{minhp}</color> to teleport home.
